oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mapred.input

Class CompositeInputFormat<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.mapred.input.CompositeInputFormat<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of the record's key. The same used by internalInputFormat
    V - The type of the record's value. The same used by internalInputFormat.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractCompositeInputFormat<K,V>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileSplitInputFormat, SpatialFilterInputFormat

    public abstract class CompositeInputFormat<K,V>
extends <any>
implements AbstractCompositeInputFormat<K,V>
    Abstract InputFormat which uses another InputFormat (internalInputFormat) to read data and allows adding additional functionality such as filtering the data. The internal input format must be a subclass of FileInputFormat or CombineFileInputFormat.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public void configure(JobConf conf)

      • getDelegateRecordReader

        public abstract <any> getDelegateRecordReader(FileSplit split,
                                              JobConf conf,
                                              Reporter reporter)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a record reader instance. The returned record instance can be a wrapper of the internalInputFormat's record reader. This method is called after getRecordReader(). If the internalInputFormat is a CombineFileInputFormat subclass, this method can be called as many times as paths are contained in the CombineFileSplits.
        Parameters:
        split - a FileSplit instance
        conf - the job configuration
        reporter - a Reporter instance
        Returns:
        a RecordReader instance.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getFittingInputSplit

        public static InputSplit getFittingInputSplit(JobConf conf,
                                              <any> inputFormat,
                                              InputSplit split)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Returns an instance of an InputSplit subclass appropriate for the given InputFormat. For example, if the passed split is a FileSplit instance and the InputFormat is a CombineFileInputFormat implementation, the returned split will be a instance of CombineFileSplit.
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
        inputFormat - an InputFormat instance
        split - an InputSplit instance
        Returns:
        if the passed split fits the input format, it is returned, otherwise a new one that fits is returned.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getInternalInputFormat

        public <any> getInternalInputFormat(JobConf jobConf)
        Gets an instance of the class set as the internal input format
        Specified by:
        getInternalInputFormat in interface AbstractCompositeInputFormat<K,V>
        Parameters:
        jobConf - the job configuration
        Returns:
        an InputFormat instance

      • getInternalInputFormatClass

        public static <K,V> java.lang.Class<? extends <any>> getInternalInputFormatClass(JobConf jobConf)
        Gets the internal input format type which is used to actually read the data.
        Parameters:
        jobConf - the job configuration
        Returns:
        a class which is a subclass of FileInputFormat or CombineFileInputFormat

      • getRecordInfoProvider

        public static <K,V> RecordInfoProvider<K,V> getRecordInfoProvider(RecordInfoProvider<K,V> provider,
                                                                  JobConf conf)
        Gets an instance of the specified RecordInfoProvider implementation
        Parameters:
        provider - if null, a new instance will be returned, otherwise, the same instance will be returned. It is used to release the caller from checking if the instance is null.
        conf - the job configuration
        Returns:
        a RecordInfoProvider instance

      • getRecordInfoProviderClass

        Gets the class of the RecordInfoProvider implementation
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a class that extends from RecordInfoProvider
